bibl.title: More Ostraca from the Fitzwilliam Museum.
bibl.note: Continued from: ZPE 80 (1990) 221-238 and 81 (1990) 267-269. - Nos 1-11. Receipts. - Nos 12-13. Jar labels ('Palestinian' amphorae used to hold pistachios and dried fruits.). Thebes - Oxyrhynchite nome, 2nd c. BC - 6th c. AD. - See also: David W.J. GILL, Nachwort. An Archaeological Note on Two Ostraca from the Fitzwilliam Collection, ibidem, p. 277.
SHELTON John C., More Ostraca from the Fitzwilliam Museum.
